comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Mexican politician. The NYT of October 20, 1913 (the day after the date Wystan notes is written on the negative) query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B0DEFDD1E3BE633A... reports that Jose Requena, vice-presidential candidate on the ticket of General Diaz announced that, because no candidate could win the election, Diaz would withdraw if General Huerta became a candidate. An earlier NYT article query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B04E1DC113CE633A... indicates that his middle name is Luis.

comment._content: swanq and Wystan: Thanks for the additional info. We'll include some in the record next time we update.
